entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
